snippet: The New York City group will perform a modern take on Shakespeare’s “The Tempest” at the Edinburgh Festival Fringe.
abstract: Student repertory company at Hostos Community College in the Bronx will travel to Scotland to perform at Edinburgh Festival Fringe; company runs on shoestring budget, rehearsing in classrooms of college, which does not have theater department; group will be among more than 24,000 artists from 41 countries performing during three-week festival.
lead_paragraph: The New York City group will perform a modern take on Shakespeare’s “The Tempest” at the Edinburgh Festival Fringe.

headline.seo: Actors From Hostos Community College to Perform at Scotland Event
headline.main: World Stage Awaits a Student Repertory Company From the Bronx
headline.print_headline: College Troupe Formed To Lift Students’ Sights Is Bound for World Stage
headline.sub: Actors From Hostos Community College to Appear on a World Stage
